message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1000000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950000. This represents a significant saving of $50000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this is a fair deal that reflects both the value of the product and your anticipated use of it. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
